snippet.title: Cantata | Early Access Release Date Trailer [HD]
snippet.description:
Cantata Early Access launches on the 12th May 2022! 
Wishlist today on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/690370/Cantata/

Choose a Commanding Officer from one of three factions. Explore, expand, and endure across campaigns set on a mysterious planet steeped in mystical sci-fi lore! Fight tactical, turn-based battles across large maps. Play with friends in local + online multiplayer. Mod the game and make it your own!

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/cantatagame
Join our newsletter: https://bit.ly/3txnrV0
Get in the community on Discord: https://discord.gg/G4DSKXBA6p

✏️ Developed by Afterschool Studio
🐺 Published by Modern Wolf
